mapper.select: /* FarmMapper.selectFarmByFarmId */ select a.farm_id as farmId , case when a.farm_kind = '01' THEN '농장' when a.farm_kind = '02' THEN '목장' else '체험' end as farmKindNm , a.farm_name as farmName , a.farm_zip as farmZip , concat(format(a.farm_use_amt, 0), '원') as farmUseAmt , '0' as reviewStar , '0명' as reviewStarCnt , a.farm_longitude as farmLongitude , a.farm_latitude as farmLatitude , concat(a.farm_use_time, ' ', '체험시간 ', a.farm_use_time_detail, '시간') as farmUseTimeDetail from farm a where farm_status = '01' and farm_id = #{farmId}

/* FarmMapper.selectFarmBannerImage */ select c.file_url as bannerImageUrl from farm a left join file_group b on a.farm_banner_image = b.file_group_id left join file c on b.file_group_id = c.file_group_id where a.farm_status = '01' and farm_id = #{farmId}
